r.d: Zip is an extension to create and read zip files.
r.n: - enable stream by default, * use uri like zip:///path/to/my.zip#entryname.dat (the URI format may change in future version) - add support for print_r/var_dump (Zip object) - add tests for the OO (still need more) - add more example, like using xmlreader and zip stream to parse OpenDocument meta info
